work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: از اين بيان ايشان معلوم شد مقصود اين عبد را اصلاح امور ظاهره دانسته‌اند لذا آياتی باسم ايشان در سوره هيکل نازل بعضی از ان ذکر ميشود تا ان جناب بدانند که امر اين مظلوم للّه و من عند اللّه بوده *
translation: From his words it became apparent that he understood the purpose of this Servant to have been a request for material assistance. We, therefore, revealed in his (Napoleon III's) name verses in the Súratu’l-Haykal, some of which We now quote, that thou mayest know that the Cause of this Wronged One hath been revealed for the sake of God, and hath come from Him:
